TEXT.TITLE: REICHHOLD <RCI> RAISES WAFERBOARD RESIN PRICES
TEXT.BODY: Reichhold Chemicals Inc said its Reichhold Ltd subsidiary has raised prices seven U.S. cent per pound on powdered phenolic waferboard resins, effective July 1, due to sharp increases in the cost of phenol. Reuter
